itemInfo.itemDesc:
Grunil Armor developed to its maximum potential.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Armor of Iron Wall, Grunil Armor of Agility, Grunil Armor of Intimidation, Grunil Armor

item.name: Brass Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper and Zinc together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Tough Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Black Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Black Crystals.

item.name: Grunil Armor of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Iron Wall energy is contained within this Grunil Armor.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Armor of Iron Wall, Grunil Armor

item.name: Grade 3 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Grunil Armor
item.desc: Custom made armor for fastidious adventurers\n-Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Grunil Armor of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Iron Wall energy is contained within this Grunil Armor.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Armor of Iron Wall, Grunil Armor

item.desc:
The energy of Agility is contained within this Grunil Armor.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Armor of Agility, Grunil Armor

item.name: Grunil Armor of Intimidation
item.desc:
The energy of Intimidation is contained within this Grunil Armor.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Armor of Intimidation, Grunil Armor
